title: Business Consultant for startup companies
responsibilities: Detailed study of the current status of the establishment to identify strengths and weaknesses.
Designing a Business Model for Startups: Detailed Departmental Roles.
Develop customer acquisition and retention strategies.
Analyze the profitability of different revenue models.
Build and maintain the brand identity and messaging.
How to do digital marketing on social media platforms and reach the right audience to promote a product and increase sales.

title: Social Media Accounts Developer (own business)
responsibilities: Developing and managing social media accounts to build a strong online presence.
Creating and curating engaging content that aligns with the brand's voice and objectives.
Increasing viewership and reaching the target audience by understanding algorithms and content suitable for the specific demographic.
